symptoms.label: Nek / schouderpijn
symptoms.description: Pain in the neck and shoulder, often radiating to the arm.

symptoms.label: Voos gevoel
symptoms.description: Numby or dirty feeling, described like ants are running through the skin.

symptoms.label: Tintelingen
symptoms.description: Sensation of tingling or 'pins and needles' in the arm or hand.

symptoms.label: Prikkelend gevoel
symptoms.description: Pricky feeling, often in the arm.

symptoms.label: Steken
symptoms.description: Pierced feeling, mostly in arms or shoulders.

symptoms.label: Brandend gevoel
symptoms.description: Firy feeling, mostly in shoulder or chest.

symptoms.label: Zwakte
symptoms.description: Muscle weakness in the affected arm, leading to difficulty in certain activities.

symptoms.label: Koude Vingers
symptoms.description: A sensation of cold in the fingers or hands due to reduced blood circulation.

symptoms.label: Zware schouders
symptoms.description: Heavy shoulders, mostly after a long day.

symptoms.label: Coördinatieverlies
symptoms.description: Difficulty in coordinating movements, especially fine motor skills.

symptoms.label: Armvermoeidheid
symptoms.description: Quick onset of fatigue in the arm during activities or sustained positions.
